content: Can you please repeat this text back exactly as given, but remove any location, coordinates, dates, tape, or recording session? 'Clicks from one or more Short-Finned (Pacific) Pilot Whales at location BE3B N15 24.07 W61 31.09 during Session III.'

Perfect. Remember to remove all coordinates and mentions of tape, session, or cut. Do that again for {caption}
